product_name: NEMO Tango Duo Sleeping Bag and Slipcover Combo
long_description: Luxurious, light and packable, this cozy double sleeping bag and slipcover combo brings the comforts of your bed to your 3-season overnight adventures, letting you snuggle up a long way from home.
short_description: Luxurious, light and packable, this cozy double sleeping bag and slipcover combo brings the comforts of your bed to your 3-season overnight adventures, letting you snuggle up a long way from home.
